ul.li: Experienced full-stack web developer with expertise in JavaScript, React, and MongoDB. 💻
Skilled in Android app development using Java and Kotlin. 📡
Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for creating efficient solutions. 🧪
Proficient in front-end development with React, building intuitive and responsive user interfaces. 📈
Experienced in server-side development using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for effective data management. 📦
Published multiple apps on the Google Play Store, keeping up with the latest Android development practices. 💻
Strong ability to deliver projects from inception to deployment, meeting requirements and deadlines. 🚀
Collaborative team player, experienced in agile environments and conducting code reviews. 🤓
Actively engaged in continuous learning, attending conferences, participating in hackathons, and contributing to open-source projects. 📚
Committed to developing innovative, user-focused applications that make a positive impact. 🚀
Open to collaboration, questions, and connections within the developer community. 🤝
